definition: to visit frequently/to have frequent dealings (with)/to see each other often
to come/to arrive/to come round/ever since/next
to go (in a direction)/to/towards/(of a train) bound for/past/previous

sentences.english: Continue to children often come often to.
sentences.chinese: 繼續爲了孩子常來常往。

sentences.english: The ornament of a house is the friends who frequent it.
sentences.chinese: 房子的裝飾就是常來常往的朋友。
